sentence.Network_en: We had an inkling that something might be happening.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们隐约感觉可能正有什么事情发生。

sentence.Network_en: He had no inkling of what was going on.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对正在发生的事情一无所知。

sentence.Network_en: He gave me an inkling of what was to come.
sentence.Network_cn: 他给我暗示将要发生什么事.

But later in the conversation , she shared an inkling ., 但在交谈后期 , 她有个暗示.
he just didn't have any inkling that it would happen on this spring morning .他只是没有任何迹象表明会发生在这个春天的早晨。
the implication of modernism inkling in wuthering heights ., < 呼啸山庄 > 蕴涵的现代主义艺术端倪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'a mention in an undertone, a hint'): from the rare verb inkle 'utter in an undertone', of unknown origin

entry.def: If you have an inkling of something, you have a vague idea about it.

example.ex: I had no inkling of his real purpose until much later...
example.tran: 直到后来很久我才对他的真实目的略知一二。

example.ex: We had an inkling that something might be happening.
example.tran: 我们隐约感觉可能正有什么事情发生。

means.word_mean: 1. a slight suggestion or vague understanding;

sentences.sentence: "he had no inkling what was about to happen"

auth_sentence.content: She had had no inkling of his identity.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had had no inkling of his identity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had had no inkling of his identity.

auth_sentence.content: Therein lies the inkling of some controversial approaches.
auth_sentence.res_content: Therein lies the inkling of some controversial approaches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Therein lies the inkling of some controversial approaches.

auth_sentence.content: If Jan's surprised, she shows no inkling Of it at all.
auth_sentence.res_content: If Jan's surprised, she shows no inkling Of it at all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If Jan's surprised, she shows no inkling Of it at all.

Sentence.sentence: But a new application called Inkling might change all that.
Digital textbooks are not going to catch on," says Inkling CEO Matt Maclnnis as he's giving me a demo（演示）over coffee
He calls Inkling a platform for publishers to build rich multimedia content from the ground up, with a heavy emphasis on real-world functionality.

sentences.en: He gave me an inkling of what was to come.
sentences.cn: 他给我暗示将要发生什么事。
